introduction:
Your car suddenly stops working.
There is an old cottage up the hill, you walk to it in search of some shelter from the storm. As you knock, the door creaks open... With hesitance you enter.
WHAM! The door slams shut!
You adjust to the darkness and look at your surroundings...

items.name: Game Console
items.description: It looks like a PlayStation, but on closer inspection it's just a plastic toy.

win: The fresh air fills your lungs. You got out!
